headline: BD’s Q1 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Becton, Dickinson and Company’s first quarter results were met with a sharp negative market reaction, reflecting concerns around revenue performance and margin compression. Management attributed the shortfall primarily to weaker demand in its Life Sciences segment, driven by reduced global research funding and slower-than-expected recovery in diagnostic testing volumes.
